page.title: 05Baptist Chapel,Prickwillow
page.content: {Mr.Rice}gave us the information about the Baptist Chapel in the Main Street. 'The Chapel was built on Oak Piles but as the land has sunk there is now a four foot drop under the floor.As soon as the piles can be seen we will have to effect some renovation as the piles would rot in the air. We have two services every Sunday. One at Eleven and one at Six-Thirty in the evening. In the winter the service is changed to three forty-five so that the elderly can get home before dark. About eighteen come for the morning service, less for the evening. We have a{part time Minister}that takes the services, as he has other Chapels to look after as well. There is a Mid-Week Prayer meeting and a Sisterhood meeting twice a month on a Tuesday .
